doc.title: TBS Storyline
doc.plot: Hosted by Emmy winner Myrna Moore, TBS Storyline is a venue for dynamic, in-depth stories that address relevant issues. Thoughtful storytelling, engaging features, candid interviews and show-stopping performances from Atlanta's most talented musicians are packaged with high-end production values rarely seen in local television. Each week TBS Storyline's team of Emmy Award winning producers explore the issues, celebrate the arts and chronicle the people, places and storylines that shape our city. Engaging segments like Cover Story, an in-depth segment addressing Georgia-specific problems are complimented by weekly features such as; My Atlanta, Pathfinders, In the Kitchen, and The Lighter Side, a light-hearted look at slices of Americana. Inspired performances from some of Atlanta's most talented musicians highlight our Soundstage segment. TBS Storyline fills a need in local television for an entertaining, timely, relevant program.
